name: Space Shooter (itch) (JoeyL816)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Projects.

Modifications:

1) Design Modifications 

  • Modify the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way( making change in instruction page).
  • Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

2) Aesthetic (Visual/Audio) Modifications

  • Add additional significant and coherent graphical elements to the game, such as new enemies or environmental challenges, complete with animated states.

3) Gameplay Modifications

  • Add new obstacles and challenges.
